metadata.description: Tails follows the exploits of hapless vegan cartoonist Ethan, as he manages relationships and litter boxes, all while trying to successfully publish his comic strip, Crusader Cat. As his life gets weirder in the real world, it also does on the comic page. Before he knows it, Ethan gets in over his head when fantasy and reality combine -- and then things get really weird.
metadata.name: Tails
